attributes.action: Allow all pubs to purchase beers, wines and spirits at the best price. Stop the monopoly that Marston's have.
attributes.additional_details:
Breweries, such as Marston's, insist that all beers, wines, spirits & minerals are purchased directly from them. Prices are far higher than you can obtain from local suppliers. This has the effect of keeping prices high for the consumer and in turn sees pubs going out of business and landlords bancrupt.
I want the Government to stop this monopoly and allow free trade.
